hero section.secondary heading: Be Part of Positive Change, Start with Yourself
hero section.paragraph: Every individual contributing to this campaign becomes part of a positive change that encompasses the entire community. Start with yourself and be the role model to be emulated. Let your positive energy radiate with enthusiasm and motivation to those around you. Remember that collective effort leads to amazing results, and the challenges we face will appear fragile next to our determination and commitment to bring about change.

info section.header: Far Away but Can't Join Us?
paragraph: Participate with your friends in cleaning up a location in your area and use the hashtag
because the goal of the campaign is to clean as many places as possible in Iraq and raise awareness about the importance of cleanliness.

upcoming events section.paragraph: Our message to all institutions, companies, departments, and media is to join us and support the campaign so that we can contribute together to change on a day that brings all Iraqis together under the slogan

faces section.header: Be One of the Faces of the Campaign, Participate and Contribute to Your Country
paragraph: This campaign is the people's campaign and it's our responsibility to preserve it and spread the spirit of change, cooperation, love, and this campaign is not just about cleaning
but its message includes all the changes we need to make with our own hands. Iraq needs many campaigns, whether they are cleaning or others.
And this is just the beginning!!

header: Our Campaigns are Everywhere in Iraq,
Join and Be Part of This Change
map section.paragraph: Most of the waste we collect will be recycled! That's right: glass, plastic, aluminum. The first step of recycling is waste sorting.

faq data.question: What is the Cleaning Campaign?
faq data.answer: The Cleaning Campaign is a collective effort to clean public areas and the environment in Iraq to contribute to improving the appearance of cities and maintaining their cleanliness.

faq data.question: How can I participate in the Cleaning Campaign?
faq data.answer: You can participate in the Cleaning Campaign by volunteering in the dedicated events and following the announced instructions to participate effectively.

faq data.question: What are the benefits of participating in the Cleaning Campaign?
faq data.answer: Your participation in the Cleaning Campaign contributes to improving the environment, preserving city cleanliness, and enhancing environmental awareness in the community.

faq data.question: Can I participate regardless of age?
faq data.answer: Yes, everyone can participate in the Cleaning Campaign regardless of age, as promoting the importance of cleanliness is essential for everyone.

faq data.question: What should I bring to participate in the campaign?
faq data.answer: You may need to bring gloves and simple cleaning tools like a garbage bag and a brush to facilitate the cleaning process.

newsletter section.paragraph: Stay informed about our campaigns, events, and announcements! Feel free to subscribe with your email address.
